descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[size=6]Welcome to the full Overhaul of Arcadia's Cauldron!!
[/size][/center][center][/center]Hey guys what I have done here is taken the dull and boring Arcadia's Cauldron into something that is awesome (well in my opinion anyway). Instead of reading me ramble on I'll let the screenshots do the talking


   [center][size=6]For those of you wondering I WILL have an optional file to remove the water, I just thought it might be a cool feature. If you guys want me to upload the file just say so and I will deliver [/size]
[/center]
author: Achilles1880_Me
